features: Ideal For All Skin Types: Infused with annatto seed, brightening grapefruit, and orange & lemon peel oils, this fast-absorbing moisturizer-meets-serum is as light as water and quickly hydrates & soothes all skin types. A perfect addition to your skincare routine for both men & women.
Benefits of Honey: With a multitude of benefits, honey extract has soothing properties to aid with skin irritation.
Benefits of Annatto Seed: This antioxidant-rich botanical extract helps smooth fine lines while calming and protecting skin.

Lightweight Moisturizer: Our Citrus-Honey Aqua Glow is a lightweight facial moisturizer that goes on nicely over serums and absorbs quickly. Leaves your skin feeling soft, yet nicely hydrated without feeling too heavy.
Clean & Cruelty-Free Formula: Our Citrus-Honey Aqua Glow is made with a clean formula that is alcohol-free, fragrance-free, cruelty-free, and does not contain harmful chemicals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For All Skin Types Infused with annatto seed and brightening grapefruit, orange and lemon peel oils, this fast-absorbing, moisturizer-meets-serum is as light as water and quickly hydrates and soothes. How to Use Apply a dime-size amount of moisturizer to your skin in light circular motions as the last step of your skincare routine. Layer under a thicker moisturizer for dry skin types. Lightweight Moisturizer Goes on nicely over serums and absorbs quickly, leaving your skin feeling soft, yet nicely hydrated without feeling too heavy. Acne Spot Treatment Trio How you treat blemishes depends on the stage it's at. Luckily, Peach Slices spot treatments cover all the bases! Consider this your ultimate acne toolkit.

Vegan & Cruelty-Free Formula Our Citrus-Honey Aqua Glow is made with a clean formula that is alcohol-free, fragrance-free, cruelty-free, vegan friendly, and does not contain harmful chemicals. Our Promise Our Peach Slices collection is clean, effective and fun! We bring you the latest and greatest high-performance products with trendsetting, innovative formulas and textures. Play, experiment, multi-mask. Annatto Seed This antioxidant-rich botanical extract helps fight wrinkles and soothes irritated skin. It also aids in healing minor skin wounds, sun damage and other signs of aging. Glowing Skin Honey extract and hydrating ingredients such as glycerin and ceramides nourish and plump, giving skin a lit-from-within glow.

Snail Rescue Moisturizer Snail Rescue Wash-Off Jelly Mask Snail Rescue Toner Deep Blemish Microdarts Acne Spot Dots Dark Spot Microdarts Description This weightless moisturizer helps quench thirsty skin, zap zits, and minimize shine thanks to 95% snail mucin and cica. "Snail jelly" mask instantly refreshes and calms as it's applied onto the skin. This intensive treatment clears skin and targets dark spots, blemishes, pores, and dullness. Fast-absorbing toner is your fast track to hydrated, blemish-free skin and an even glow with 95% snail mucin and cica. Microdart patches for emerging and underground blemishes. Speedy, non-drying acne treatment patches. Microdart patches for dark spots and hyperpigmentation. Daily Acne Routine ✓ ✓ ✓ Early Stages & Deep Pimples ✓ Active Blemishes ✓ Post Zit Redness & Dark Spots ✓ Gluten-Free ✓ ✓ Vegan ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Cruelty-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ No Harmful Chemicals ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves my face glowing
reviews.reviewText: This is a repurchase. I bought my first bottle from a store that is closed so I had to find another place and I am glad that Amazon has it. I am very sensitive to smells and this doesn't have a scent. It feels lightweight but not watery or sticky. It is the perfect consistency for me. I usually wear it at night since it doesn't have spf and my face is glowing in the morning. When my face is feeling dry, I do wear it during the day. If you do wear it during the day, please remember to wear it sunscreen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for the past six months and it's easily become my favorite moisturizer. It smells great and the gel consistency is just right, not watery or really thick. It's light, but a little bit sticky. My favorite thing is it doesn't sit on top of your skin and smear off like I've had other moisturizers do. Like If you run your finger down the side of your face you get a weird residue, like you would with sunblock. None of that here! I don't wear a full face of makeup, but as someone who has to create my own eyebrows daily the pens and pencils don't weakly smear on top like they do with the other moisturizers that coat your face. The lines turn out very smooth and opaque.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CANNOT BEAT THIS
reviews.reviewText: I REALLY LIKE THIS.I HAVE INCORPORATED THIS INTO MY DAILY SKIN CARE.I HAVE SENSITIVE SKIN AND WAS HESITANT AFTER READING REVIEWS OF THE SCENT HOWEVER IT IS A LIGHT BUT VERY PLEASANT SCENT AND DOES NOT BOTHER MY SKIN. I ONLY USE A PEA SIZED AMOUNT

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great summer moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Very light, water-based moisturizer for the summer! I love the scent and goes well with my oily skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not sticky and smells amazing
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new moisturizer, and was tired of the elf one I had. So I was looking on Amazon and came across this one. One the price caught my attention and so did the packaging. I was a little hesitant though when I got it because it says gel moisturizer...my skin doesn't usually like the gel moisturizer. So I was like just try it and if I don't like..return. so I put it on my face and wow it feel so soft and smells like a citrus fruit tree..love it. It is not sticky at all, it's literally a lotion with a texture of gel and it absorbs fast in my skin. I have used it for about a week now...and it's going to be a staple in my beauty care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It smells so good
reviews.reviewText: I have no idea if this face lotion is doing anything to make my skin prettier or younger but it is very light weight and smells delicious, like citrus.I read this brand is a cheaper version of a fancier one, I like that a lot. Will explore more of this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells and feels great, but caused clogged pores for me
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the fragrance, consistency/feel, and packaging, and the quality seemed excellent overall, especially for the price point.But I was disappointed in the effect a very small amount of this product had on some oily areas of my skin. The pores around my nose, cheeks and chin were clogged overnight.So far, though, I would definitely still recommend this as an under eye serum! I will be cautiously continuing to use it for this. It works much better on drier skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vey very nice
reviews.reviewText: Not greasy.Soaks right inNice lite orange scentLil dab'l do yaSkin feels great all day and next if that's your jamOrder 2..just because
